data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Tehri Garhwal, Uttarakhand, India.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Tehri Garhwal, Uttarakhand, India
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, help the 6,808 believers in Tehri Garhwal to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the county of Tehri Garhwal to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Tehri Garhwal to agree with you and with one another.
Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Jat Dehia (Muslim traditions) people might believe through him.
Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the county of Tehri Garhwal.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Father, set on fire the hearts and passion of your church in the county of Tehri Garhwal.
data.verse: Do not be slothful in zeal, be fervent in spirit, serve the Lord.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 6,808 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

location.name: Tehri Garhwal
location.people_groups_list: Rajput (Muslim traditions), Brahmin Upreti, Jat Dhankar, Faqir, Jat Dehia (Hindu traditions)
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Rajput (Muslim traditions) (2,893,000), Brahmin Upreti (200), Jat Dhankar (48,000), Faqir (90,000), Jat Dehia (Hindu traditions) (273,000)
